alert.note: Alert for Banner; Cheyenne; Kimball (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 4:51PM CDT until July 08 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Cheyenne County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Northeastern Kimball County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Southeastern Banner County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 415 PM MDT. * At 351 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Harrisburg, or 12 miles north of Kimball, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kimball and Kimball Airport. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 16 and 24. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
